meta.parsing: When 'take' is a number, there should be the option to pick courses. When 'take' is a string, all the courses must be taken to satisfy the requirement. When 'options' is an array, it represents all the courses that can satisfy the requiremnt. When 'options' is a string it can be used to generate that list of courses from the data in courses.json. Here a preceeding + sign means any course with this number or higher. Most majors will be arrays. Special cases like EGR are objects.

EGR.breadth: (This part is not finished.) Latin Honors, OR Major/Minor in Division I or Division II, OR Submit Proposal
